detaileddescription.para: A fast lite memory efficient Scientific Computing for php
An efficient decomposition of a square positive definite matrix into a lower triangular matrix and its conjugate transpose.
The Eigen decompositon or (Spectral decomposition) is a matrix factorization resulting in a matrix of eigenvectors and a corresponding array of eigenvalues.
The LU decomposition is a factorization of a Matrix as the product of a lower and upper triangular matrix as well as a permutation matrix.
SVD Compute the singular value decomposition of a matrix and return an object of the singular values and unitary matrices
